00008 void Print(Stack<int> bil,Stack<string>operatorx){
00009         cout<<"Stack bilangan"<<endl;
00010         for(int i = 0;i<=bil.getDataCount()-1;i++)
00011         {
00012                 cout<<i<<"). "<<bil.getData(i)<<endl;
00013         }
00014         cout<<"Stack operator"<<endl;
00015         for(int j = 0;j<=operatorx.getDataCount()-1;j++)
00016         {
00017                 cout<<j<<"). "<<operatorx.getData(j)<<endl;
00018         }
00019 }

00021 int convert(string roman_Numeral)
00022 {
00023         int i =0;
00024     int arabic_Numeral=0;
00025     while(i<roman_Numeral.length())
00026     {
00027                 if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'M')
00028                 {       
00029                         arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+1000;
00030                 }
00031 
00032                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'D')
00033                 {
00034                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00035                         {
00036                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-500;}
00037                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+500;}
00038                         }
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'C')
00042                 {
00043                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00044                         {
00045                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'D'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-100;}
00046                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+100;}
00047                         }
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'L')
00051                 {
00052                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00053                         {
00054                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'D' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'C'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-50;}
00055                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+50;}
00056                         }
00057                 }                       
00058 
00059                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'X')
00060                 {
00061                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00062                         {
00063                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'D' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'C' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'L'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-10;}
00064                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+10;}
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'V')
00069                 {
00070                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00071                         {
00072                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'D' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'C' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'L' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'X'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-5;}
00073                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+5;}
00074                         }
00075                 }   
00076 
00077                 else if (roman_Numeral[i] == 'I')
00078                 {
00079                         if(i<roman_Numeral.length()+1)
00080                         {
00081                                 if(roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'M' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'D' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'C' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'L' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'X' || roman_Numeral[i+1] == 'V'){ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral-1;}
00082                                 else{ arabic_Numeral=arabic_Numeral+1;}
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085                 else
00086                 {
00087                         cout<<"Your input is wrong"<<endl;
00088                 }
00089                 i++;
00090     }
00091         return arabic_Numeral;
00092 }

00094 void SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00095 {
00096         float popbil1;
00097         float popbil2;
00098         string dumpoperator;
00099         float dumpbil;
00100         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00101         bil>>dumpbil;
00102         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00103         bil>>dumpbil;
00104         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00105         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00106         if(popoperator == "*")
00107         {
00108                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00109         }
00110         else if(popoperator == "/")
00111         {
00112                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00113         }
00114         else if(popoperator == "%")
00115         {       
00116                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00117                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00118                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00119                 bil<< hasil;
00120         }
00121         
00122         else if(popoperator == "+")
00123         {
00124                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00125         }
00126         else if(popoperator == "-")
00127         {
00128                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00129         }
00130 }
